author: gpetruc
body:
#### PR description:

This PR ports to the CMSSW master branch two small updates to the correlator trigger code, for serializing and de-serializing electron objects in GT format (for GT emulator usage), and producing pattern files for integration tests (for correlator internal CI, not run in production)

Code is from @cerminar  

The corresponding PR to the L1T Phase-2 integration branch is https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1066 for @aloeliger 

#### PR validation:
Tested on `CMSSW_13_2_X_2023-05-09-2300`  with `runTheMatrix.py  -l 23234.0` and `L1Trigger/Phase2L1ParticleFlow/test/make_l1ct_binaryFiles_cfg.py`
title: Update Phase-2 L1T Correlator code to l1ct-125x-v1.16
